Articles.Content:
I can get into the main menu but when I try to start a game or a new one it stops when it loads as far as "never leaving Eve".  I've tried restarting both the game and my pc to no avail. It loads OK until it tries to actually get into game play. 

Never mind, I figured out why. I can't figure out how to delete this post.

Edited April 14, 2023 by kellerlk4
Found the reason myself.
